meanings.definition: A genus of small dipterous flies.
meanings.sent1: The muscae buzzed around the picnic table.
meanings.sent2: I saw many muscae in the garden today.
meanings.sent3: The muscae seemed to be having a party on the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: The muscae danced in the air like tiny ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The annoying muscae kept landing on my sandwich.

meanings.sent1: Look at all the muscae on the window sill!
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with muscae after leaving the door open.
meanings.sent3: The muscae gathered for a meeting on the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The muscae swarmed like a dark cloud in the room.
meanings.sent5: I could hear the soft hum of muscae in the room.
